title: What is your favorite all time skin!
body:
I'd have to say personally my all time favorite is Project Ashe, and then SG Lux is a close second!

You? :D

replies.body:
{{champion:84}} SilverFang Akali. Her ass is just 

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/019/698/d96.jpg
Arcade Sona! :D

Armor of the Fifth Age Taric

Then Bilgewater Swain (i really like FFX and pirates), Dark star Thresh (concept) and Project Jhin (music, vfx).
Honorable mention: Moo Cow Alistar

Gentleman Cho'Gath

{{champion:31}} Yes, good sir? {{champion:31}}
Shadowfire Kindred or Freljord Taliyah

I don’t even own Vayne, nor do I own the skin, but, MAN am I absolutely in love with PROJECT Vayne! It’s so stunning, and the pink/magenta works so well with the new model. The splash art only furthered my love for the skin too! I might one day end up playing her just to see it more often .

Sun Goddess Karma is another one of my favorites. It’s high quality splash art, new description and the way it matches her kit in game make me a very happy art boy.

Not sure if it went on early sale or not, but probably worth it for you if it hasn't gone on early sale. I didn't play much Vayne but grabbed the skin because I was in love with it as well and it was totally worth it even on release. It just feels so good and strong.
Probably either Snow Day Bard or Candy King Ivern. One is the most horrifying skin of all time with the noises to match and the other has some good old penguin bombing action.
Blood Moon Jhin. It fits his character far better than his other skins.
HOW LOVELY{{champion:202}}

Captain Miss Fortune {{champion:21}} 

It should be her default skin imo. Not only is it consistent with the lore, I feel like it fits her character a lot better.

Royal Guard Fiora {{champion:114}}  and Dragon Sorceress Zyra {{champion:143}} look really nice too.

Also Frostfire Annie {{champion:1}} is cute af.

Hmmm, I have several favorite skins for several reasons, let's see:

{{champion:21}} Captain Fortune: Miss Fortune is my favorite champ. This is the only skin that you ever seen her serious and there isn't as much main lore related skins as there used to be. And it's just plain awesome to me.

{{champion:51}} Arctic Ops Caitlyn: It was the first ever skin I ever own that wasn't the freebie skins at the time. Then again you can technically called it a freebie if you bought the PC Gamer magazine during the time of the skin release. 

{{champion:10}} Aether Wing Kayle: First ever Legendary skin I owned from a mystery gift. Came from one of my best friends which holds a lot of significance to me.

{{champion:10}}Judgement Kayle : ~~Wow two Kayle skins in a row~~ Mainly if they made Medieval Twitch and Grey Warwick super badass after their reworks then this might be one too! Also shows how long I been playing league since I rarely see anyone else, besides me, using this skin now a days. I hope Riot brings this skin back as part of the honor capsule for current players to love and enjoy, or just missing that one Kayle skin for there collection ~~*stares at Victorious Morgana*~~

And last but not least:

{{champion:25}} Ghost Bride Morgana: Cultural reasons! And the very skin that almost got me into gold for the past two seasons. ~~*Still staring at that Victorious Morgana*~~

> [{quoted}](name=ReisenTheDos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PLOouJtm,comment-id=0039,timestamp=2018-03-27T07:33:20.333+0000)
>
> Hmmm, I have several favorite skins for several reasons, let's see:
> 
> {{champion:21}} Captain Fortune: Miss Fortune is my favorite champ. This is the only skin that you ever seen her serious and there isn't as much main lore related skins as there used to be. And it's just plain awesome to me.

> {{champion:10}} Aether Wing Kayle: First ever Legendary skin I owned from a mystery gift. Came from one of my best friends which holds a lot of significance to me.
> 
> {{champion:10}}Judgement Kayle : ~~Wow two Kayle skins in a row~~ Mainly if they made Medieval Twitch and Grey Warwick super badass after their reworks then this might be one too! Also shows how long I been playing league since I rarely see anyone else, besides me, using this skin now a days. I hope Riot brings this skin back as part of the honor capsule for current players to love and enjoy, or just missing that one Kayle skin for there collection ~~*stares at Victorious Morgana*~~
> 
> And last but not least:
> 
> {{champion:25}} Ghost Bride Morgana: Cultural reasons! And the very skin that almost got me into gold for the past two seasons. ~~*Still staring at that Victorious Morgana*~~

Yep Captain MF is one of my favourite skins, as it portrays MF as she should look like.

Tempest Janna 

I wish they make some chromas for it

Cosmic Reaver Kassadin
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/2c/Kassadin_CosmicReaverSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170616223050

I want this skin so much, its so cool but I have no way to get Riot points cause Paypal doesnt work in my country.

Aether Wing Kayle

Could really use a Black chroma and Green chroma.
bloodmoon yas

Hard to choose all time favorite...

**-Eternal Sword Yi(He surfs on his sword!)
-God Staff Jax
-Mecha Aatrox
-Dreadnova Darius
-Warring Kingdoms/Demonblade/Executioner Tryndamere
-Firefighter Tristana
-Warring Kingdoms Jarvan IV(HE IS LUBU!)
-Hextech Kog'Maw
-Moo Cow Alistar(Givin more Cowbell to all)
-Arcade Ezreal 
-Big Bad Warwick
-Meowkai
-Poro Rider Sejuani
-Secret Agent MF(Jessica Rabbit)
-Bittersweet Lulu(She holds the Psychotic Cupcake!)
-Corporate Mundo
-Head Mistress Fiora
-Bard Bard**


That is it atm...
Eternal sword master yi feels much smoother than his lower tier skins, cause of the sounds maybe? I like it very much tho:) Thx hextech rerolls:D
SG Lulu. It's just too cute.
moo cow alistar, tho i dont even have it

for me thats just such an impossible question, i have favorites of different kinds

my favorite "hot" skin is pentakayle

my favorite "funny in-game" skin is gentleman chogath (may be rivaled by birdio, we will see) with brolaf as a VERY close second

my favorite "cute" skin is either star guardian raka or syndra

theres just a bajillion different reasons something can be my favorite and because of that i have a bajillion favorites of everything.
Zero Mecha Sion.

As much as I'd like to have something unique, I have to agree with PROJECT Ashe. Great skin.

For splash art, I'd say Arclight Vayne with Blood Moon Diana and Blood Moon Akali taking a close second.
Dawnbringer Riven
Muse Sona, though I recently acquired Elementalist Lux, Arcade Ahri, and Star Guardian Miss Fortune and I'm in love.
Frost Blade Irelia and most of the cosmic line, they have that nice blue/gold color to them.
Pulsefire Caitlyn

Gun Goddess {{champion:21}}, for obvious reasons

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
New Frostblade Irelia or God staff Jax, albiet I still await the day the God Thighs Camille is a thing. I'm a top laner BTW.

Don't have one but i have one per each main. 
Super Galaxy Elise
Ravenborn Leblanc
Spooky Gangplank
High Noon Jhin
Dragon Sorceress Zyra
little devil teemo and supergalaxy gnar :3
Project Vayne

Exiled Morgana. So glad I picked it up when I did! It's kind of my signature skin since hardly anyone else has it or uses it if they do.

I just wish they'd do something about the splash and maybe tune the model up a bit. Correct the size and maybe revisit the old model in some ways.

> [{quoted}](name=Der Lindwurm,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=PLOouJtm,comment-id=0048,timestamp=2018-03-29T06:14:08.631+0000)
>
> Exiled Morgana. So glad I picked it up when I did! It's kind of my signature skin since hardly anyone else has it or uses it if they do.
> 
> I just wish they'd do something about the splash and maybe tune the model up a bit. Correct the size and maybe revisit the old model in some ways.

Hey, glad to hear someone else rooting for Morgana! 
She's actually getting an update with Kayle right after they finish Aatrox! IM SO EXCITED!
She deserves the attention~!

Final Boss Veigar. Project Jhin ties a close second.

But that's probably just because I like both champions.

Victorious Janna
{{sticker:cass-cry}}
Championship Riven, original not the lame 2016 one

I was kinda disappointed when they redid original champ riven for 2016. Kinda douche move. Should've just released the original one but since community cried for not getting anything special back (since they attended in S2 World Champ or bought the codes from eBay), Riot had to do something to calm them down.
But I still take the 2016 lame one. This is the closest thing some players ever get.

She was available limited time in the store in s2, they gave out codes for her in s3 worlds. Imo they should've redone it like they did neo  pax sivir and kept original pax sivir. All you get for having og cs riven now is a loading screen border everyone alt tabs out of, a tiny crown that's almost invisible, and a slight glow on her sword when you ult. It's not a huge difference and it's hard to tell them apart without looking too hard
Guardian of the sands are all great. I love all of these skins

My 3 most favorite skins are all for champs I barely even play, I can't figure out which one is my absolute favorite though.

PROJECT Yi, Full Metal Jayce, Galactic Azir
(Bullet Angel Kai'sa is getting up there fast)
Resistance Illaoi because bae finally got some attention

Superb Villain Veigar, if I had to pick just one. I don't think there a skin in the game that's a better fit for their character than this one is.

I also like Urf Nami, Archduke Nasus, Muse Sona, Rageborn Mundo, Definitely Not Udyr, Giant Enemy Crabgot, Desperada Cassiopeia, Gentleman Cho'Gath, Royal Guard Fiora, Headless Hecarim, Imperial, Viscero (>:3) and Winged Hussar Xin Zhao, Super Kennen, Safari Caitlyn, Gatekeeper Galio, Full Machine Viktor, Headhunter Rengar, Jaximus, Deep Terror Thresh, Barbarian Sion, Snowstorm Sivir, Marquis Vladimir, Scorched Earth Renekton, Void Fizz, Ruthless Pantheon (>>:3), Subterranean Nautilus, Snow Day Gnar, Redeemed Riven, Glacial Olaf, Program Camille, and Thunder Lord Ornn.
Creator Viktor.

I don't own it but I think SG Jinx looks great.

Currently the best skin in the game though is Deep Sea Nami with Aery and Mana Flow band... the colours match. :)
{{champion:32}} Regifted Amumu... 'Cause why not?
Winter Wonder Orianna :3

Spec ops teemo.
I dont even like teemo, but if there's one skin that makes playing him fun it's that skin.
Playing stock or any other skin with those lines and model feels so bad, then you pick that skin and feel like an actual vetran scout who fights for his life.
From his dart gun to how he throws his knife, just perfect, i cant play teemo without that skin.
